sourcesContent:
var render = function render() {
  var _vm = this,
    _c = _vm._self._c
  return _c(
    "ContentSlotsDistributor",
    { attrs: { "slot-key": _vm.$parent.slotKey } },
    [
      _c("blockquote", [
        _c("p", [
          _vm._v(
            "在实际应用中，很多情况事先并不知道随机变量的分布函数是什么，有的时候即便知道服从什么样的分布类型，但是却不清楚具体的参数是什么，这就需要借助于统计的知识加以明确"
          ),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("p", [_vm._v("统计学：以偏概全")]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h2", { attrs: { id: "数理统计的基本概念" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          {
            staticClass: "header-anchor",
            attrs: { href: "#数理统计的基本概念" },
          },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 数理统计的基本概念"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h3", { attrs: { id: "总体、样本和统计量" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          {
            staticClass: "header-anchor",
            attrs: { href: "#总体、样本和统计量" },
          },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 总体、样本和统计量"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("总体：研究对象的全体，记为"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X")]),
        _vm._v("。如要统计八百万个人，总体就是这八百万人，"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X")]),
        _vm._v("可能的取值有八百万个"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("个体：研究对象中某一个对象的指标叫做个体")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("样本：若干个个体的集合，记作"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v("。如"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v("为"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("n")]),
        _vm._v("维随机变量，"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("n")]),
        _vm._v("也被称为样本容量"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("样本观察值："),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("Xi")]),
        _vm._v("具体取值的集合"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(x1,x2,...,xn)")]),
        _vm._v("称作样本观察值"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("简单随机样本：设"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v("为总体"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X")]),
        _vm._v("的样本，"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v("是简单随机样本，当且仅当"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
          _vm._v("之间相互独立：个体之间毫无关联"),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [
          _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
          _vm._v("与总体"),
          _c("code", [_vm._v("X")]),
          _vm._v("的分布相同：能够很好的反映总体规律"),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("统计量："),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v("为来自于总体"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X")]),
        _vm._v("的样本，"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v("的无参表达式为"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X")]),
        _vm._v(
          "的统计量，如\n$$\n\\frac{X_1+X_2+X_3}{3},\\quad\\quad X_1^2+X_2^2+X_3^2,\\quad\\quad aX_1+2X_2-X_3\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [_c("p", [_vm._v("其中第一、二是统计量，第三不是统计量")])]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [
          _c("p", [
            _vm._v(
              "统计量是无穷无尽的，但有价值的统计量并不多：如特朗普和我，我没有统计价值，而特朗普有"
            ),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("有价值的统计量：")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "样本均值（期望）：\n$$\n\\overline{X}=\\frac{1}{n}\\sum_{i=1}^{n}X_i\n$$\n样本的k阶原点距：\n$$\nA_k=\\frac{1}{n}\\sum_{i=1}^{n}X_i^k\n$$\n如1阶原点距为样本均值，2阶原点距为：\n$$\nA_2=\\frac{1}{n}(x_1^2+x_2^2+...+x_k^2)\n$$\n样本方差：\n$$\nS^2=\\frac{1}{n-1}\\sum_{i=1}^{n}(X_i-\\overline{X})\n$$\n回顾正态分布："
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("blockquote", [
        _c("p", [
          _vm._v("接下来介绍的三个抽样分布都基于服从标准正态分布的总体"),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("若总体"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X～N(0,1)")]),
        _vm._v("，服从标准正态分布"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("则其样本"), _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")])]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [_vm._v("各随机变量相互独立")]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [_vm._v("均服从标准正态分布")]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("对于总体"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X～N(2,8)")]),
        _vm._v("，现有样本"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X1,X2")]),
        _vm._v(
          "遵循总体分布，则\n$$\naX_1+bX_2\\sim N(2a+2b,8a^2+8b^2)\\rightarrow\n\\frac{(aX_1+bX_2)-(2a+2b)}{2\\sqrt{2a^2+2b^2}}\\sim N(0,1)\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h3", { attrs: { id: "三个抽样分布" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#三个抽样分布" } },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 三个抽样分布"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h4", { attrs: { id: "卡方分布" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#卡方分布" } },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 卡方分布"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v(
          "均相互独立且服从标准正态分布，则\n$$\nX_1^2+X_2^2+...+X_n^2=Z\\sim\\Chi^2\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [_vm._v("随机变量的平方仍为随机变量")]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [_vm._v("随机变量的和仍为随机变量")]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("定义若干标准正态分布的平方和构成的随机变量服从卡方分布"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("卡方分布的性质：")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [_c("li", [_vm._v("维数为1的卡方分布就是标准正态分布的平方")])]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("$$\nX\\sim N(0,1)\\rightarrow X^2\\sim\\Chi^2(1)\n$$")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _vm._v(
            "两个独立的塌方分布相加，其结果的随机变量为他们维数之和的卡方分布"
          ),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "$$\nX\\sim\\Chi^2(m),Y\\sim\\Chi^2(n),X\\perp Y\\rightarrow X+Y\\sim\\Chi^2(m+n)\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _vm._v("卡方分布的期望为其维数"),
          _c("code", [_vm._v("n")]),
          _vm._v("，方差为维数的两倍，即"),
          _c("code", [_vm._v("2n")]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("$$\nX\\sim\\Chi^2(n)\\rightarrow E(X)=n,D(X)=2n\n$$")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _vm._v("右范围点和左范围点，对于卡方分布的密度函数，对于其面积为"),
          _c("code", [_vm._v("a/2")]),
          _vm._v(
            "的点，从右向左的横坐标记为右范围点，从左向右的横坐标记为左范围点"
          ),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "$$\n\\Chi^2_{1-\\frac{\\alpha}{2}}\\quad\\quad\\Chi^2_{\\frac{\\alpha}{2}}\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("img", {
        attrs: { src: require("./../../../.vuepress/public/img/kafang.png") },
      }),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("对于非标准正态分布的总体"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X~N(u,a^2)")]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("其样本"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v("同样服从"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("N(u,a^2)")]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "根据标准化：\n$$\n\\frac{X_i-u}{\\sigma}\\sim N(0,1)\n$$\n则\n$$\n(\\frac{X_1-u}{\\sigma})^2+(\\frac{X_2-u}{\\sigma})^2+...+(\\frac{X_n-u}{\\sigma})^2\\sim\\Chi^2(n)\n$$\n即\n$$\n\\frac{1}{\\sigma^2}\\sum_{i=1}^n(X_i-u)^2\\sim\\Chi^2(n)\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h4", { attrs: { id: "t分布" } }, [
        _c("a", { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#t分布" } }, [
          _vm._v("#"),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" t分布"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _c("code", [_vm._v("t")]),
        _vm._v("分布也是一个随机变量，是标准正态分布和卡方分布的商"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "前提条件：\n$$\nX\\sim N(0,1),Y\\sim\\Chi^2(n),X\\perp Y\n$$\n将上述标准正态分布和卡方分布做如下除法得\n$$\n\\frac{X}{\\sqrt{\\frac{Y}{n}}}=\\tau\\sim t(n)\n$$\n例题：设有总体"
        ),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X~N(0,4)")]),
        _vm._v("，现有样本"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X1,X2,X3,X4")]),
        _vm._v(
          "，问\n$$\nA=\\frac{X_1-X_2}{\\sqrt{X_3^2+X_4^2}}\\sim\\quad?\n$$\n上述随机变量"
        ),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("A")]),
        _vm._v("属于什么分布？"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "考虑分子\n$$\nX_1-X_2\\sim N(0,8)\\rightarrow\\frac{X_1-X_2}{2\\sqrt{2}}\\sim N(0,1)\n$$\n考虑分母\n$$\nX_3\\sim N(0,4)\\rightarrow \\frac{X_3}{2}\\sim N(0,1)\\rightarrow\\frac{X_3^2+X_4^2}{4}\\sim\\Chi^2(2)\n$$\n用一个正态分布除以卡方分布开根，得t分布\n$$\nU=\\frac{\\frac{X_1-X_2}{2\\sqrt{2}}}{\\sqrt{\\frac{X_3^2+X_4^2}{4}\\times\\frac{1}{2}}}=\\frac{X_1-X_2}{\\sqrt{X_3^2+X_4^2}}\\sim \\Chi^2(2)\n$$\n完全符合，其中"
        ),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("1/2")]),
        _vm._v("就是那个常数"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("1/n")]),
        _vm._v("，"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X")]),
        _vm._v("是一个标准正态分布，"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("Y")]),
        _vm._v("是一个"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("n")]),
        _vm._v(
          "维的卡方分布\n$$\n\\frac{X}{\\sqrt{\\frac{Y}{n}}}=\\tau\\sim t(n)\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("t分布的性质：")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [_vm._v("t分布的期望为0")]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [_vm._v("t分布近似服从标准正态分布")]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [
          _vm._v(
            "t分布的密度函数关于y轴对称，为偶函数，和卡方分布一样有左右范围点，并且"
          ),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("$$\nt_{1-\\frac{\\alpha}{2}}^n=-t_{\\frac{\\alpha}{2}}^n\n$$"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h4", { attrs: { id: "f分布" } }, [
        _c("a", { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#f分布" } }, [
          _vm._v("#"),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" F分布"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("是两个卡方分布的商")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "前提条件为\n$$\nX\\sim\\Chi^2(m),Y\\sim\\Chi^2(n),X\\perp Y\n$$\n将两个卡方分布做如下除法得\n$$\n\\frac{X/m}{Y/n}\\sim F(m,n)\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _vm._v("其中"),
          _c("code", [_vm._v("m,n")]),
          _vm._v("称为自由度"),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "例题：\n$$\nU\\sim t(3)\\quad U^2\\sim\\quad?\n$$\nt分布是标准正态分布和卡方分布的商\n$$\nU=\\frac{X}{\\sqrt{Y/3}}\\quad X\\sim N(0,1),Y\\sim\\Chi^2(3)\n$$\n则有\n$$\nU^2=\\frac{X^2/1}{Y/3}\n$$\n又因为\n$$\nX^2\\sim\\Chi^2(1),Y\\sim\\Chi^2(3)\n$$\n所以\n$$\nU^2\\sim F(1,3)\n$$\nF分布的性质："
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _c("code", [_vm._v("X~F(m,n)")]),
          _vm._v("，则"),
          _c("code", [_vm._v("1/X~F(n,m)")]),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [_vm._v("F分布的密度函数，分为左右范围点")]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "$$\nF_{1-\\frac{\\alpha}{2}}(m,n)\\quad F_{\\frac{\\alpha}{2}}(m,n)\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _vm._v("当"),
          _c("code", [_vm._v("0<alpha<1")]),
          _vm._v("，对于两个F分布的范围点有如下关系"),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("$$\nF_{1-\\alpha}(m,n)=\\frac{1}{F_{\\alpha}(m,n)}\n$$"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h3", { attrs: { id: "正态总体下的常见分布" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          {
            staticClass: "header-anchor",
            attrs: { href: "#正态总体下的常见分布" },
          },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 正态总体下的常见分布"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("设"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("X~N(u,a^2)")]),
        _vm._v("，取出样本"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn)")]),
        _vm._v("，各个体相互独立并且和总体分布相同"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "样本均值为：\n$$\n\\overline{X}=\\frac{1}{n}X_1+\\frac{1}{n}X_2+...+\\frac{1}{n}X_n\n$$\n易知这个均值同样是一个正态分布"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "根距正态分布相加的规则\n$$\naX_1+bX_2\\sim N(au+bu,a^2\\sigma^2+b^2\\sigma^2)\n$$\n可得\n$$\n\\overline{X}\\sim N(u,\\frac{\\sigma^2}{n})\n$$\n则均值的期望和方差分别为：正态分布期望为"
        ),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("u")]),
        _vm._v("，方差为"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("v^2")]),
        _vm._v(
          "\n$$\nE(\\overline{X})=u\\quad D(\\overline{X})=\\frac{\\sigma^2}{n}\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "将均值标准化可得\n$$\n\\frac{\\overline{X}-u}{\\frac{\\sigma}{\\sqrt{n}}}\\sim N(0,1)\n\\tag1\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("其中"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("sigma")]),
        _vm._v("是总体的均方差（方差开根），将这个"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("sigma")]),
        _vm._v("换成样本的均方差"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("S")]),
        _vm._v(
          "，可得\n$$\n\\frac{\\overline{X}-u}{\\frac{S}{\\sqrt{n}}}\\sim t(n-1)\n\\tag2\n$$\n之前已经推过，对于一个不标准的正态分布序列"
        ),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("(X1,X2,...,Xn),Xi~N(u,a^2)")]),
        _vm._v(
          "，有平方和服从卡方分布的特点\n$$\n\\frac{1}{\\sigma^2}\\sum_{i=1}^n(X_i-u)^2=\\frac{(X_1-u)^2}{\\sigma^2}+...+\\frac{(X_n-u)^2}{\\sigma^2}\\sim \\Chi^2(n)\n\\tag3\n$$\n上式中，"
        ),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("u")]),
        _vm._v("是总体期望（均值），将这个"),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("u")]),
        _vm._v(
          "换成样本均值$\\overline{X}$，可得\n$$\n\\frac{1}{\\sigma^2}\\sum_{i=1}^n(X_i-\\overline{X})^2\\sim \\Chi^2(n-1)\n$$\n乘除变换得\n$$\n\\frac{n-1}{\\sigma^2}\\frac{1}{n-1}\\sum_{i=1}^n(X_i-\\overline{X})^2\\sim \\Chi^2(n-1)\n$$\n将项中右侧替换为样本方差"
        ),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("S^2")]),
        _vm._v(
          "，得\n$$\n\\frac{n-1}{\\sigma^2}S^2\\sim\\Chi^2(n-1)\n\\tag4\n$$\n即样本方差乘以"
        ),
        _c("code", [_vm._v("总体方差分之样本数-1")]),
        _vm._v("服从样本数减一的卡方分布"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "易知样本方差为\n$$\nS^2=\\frac{1}{n-1}\\sum_{i=1}^n(X_i-\\overline{X})^2\n$$"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _vm._v("注意这里的S^2仍为一个随机变量，因为没有代入具体的值"),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("$$\nE(S^2)=\\sigma^2\n\\tag5\n$$")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("即样本方差的期望为总体方差，这很合理")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
